statements: UPDATE compliance_regulations SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE regulation_id = 1;
UPDATE compliance_records SET document = 'Updated document' WHERE record_id = 2;
UPDATE compliance_records SET timestamp = '2022-06-30 12:00:00' WHERE record_id = 3;
UPDATE compliance_regulations SET regulation_name = 'New Regulation Name' WHERE regulation_id = 1;
UPDATE compliance_documents SET document_name = 'New Document Name' WHERE document_id = 1;
UPDATE compliance_issues SET issue_description = 'Updated Issue Description' WHERE issue_id = 1;
UPDATE audit_logs SET event_description = 'Updated event description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 100;
UPDATE compliance_policies SET description = 'Updated policy description' WHERE policy_id = 5;
